page.title: 09Rodway Farm.
page.content:
My brother-in-law is a farmer. With his partner he keeps l02{Dairy {Shorthorn cows}and three{bulls,}also ll5{heifers}for replacements. He also keeps a few hens and ducks.
Of the three{bulls,}only one is a{Shorthorn,}the other two bulls are crossing bulls, one{Red Holstein for milk and the{Limousin}for beef.
He also grows a few{crops}such as grass, winter barley,spring barley, winter wheat, sugarbeet, kale and one hundred day turnips.
My brother-in-law gets up at{5.30 every morning to milk the l02 cows. On a{normal working day}he milks all the the cows, feeds around,cleans out,beds down, and also works down the fields with machinery.
